review: This is a great device. I currently have the FireTV, a 2nd Gen Apple TV and a Chromecast. While I have many things in the Google ecosystem and will continue to use the Chromecast for those things I will be retiring the AppleTV and the Fire will be my go to streamer for most likely 80% of my viewing. It really is simple to setup and use. The menu is easy to navigate, voice search works quite well and the display quality is excellent. The one quibble I have with the Fire is the remote app on Android. It is only so-so and the touchpad in that app is far too touchy, Amazon would likely be better served to have their app include a directional keypad rather than the touchpad as the touch is just too sensitive and prone to false clicks/selections.
